item.title: Mobile Legends: Bang Bang Introduces New Hero Wu Zetian, the Phoenix Empress
item.description: Mobile Legends: Bang Bang officially releases its newest hero, Wu Zetian, the Phoenix Empress, featuring area magic damage, crowd control, and a global-scale ultimate. Players can unlock her for free during the 696 event starting June 18, 2025.
